unnormalised: Hey, I'd suggest finalizing the date for the engagement soon! Maybe consider 20/12/2024? It's a Friday, so easier for people to attend. Or, if that's too close to Christmas, how about 10/01/2025? Either way, prepone the bookings ASAP, especially if you are thinking of a popular venue. And let's decide on the time too - 7:30 PM would be good for the function to start, right? Just throwing out some ideas!
normalised: Hey, I'd suggest finalizing the date for the engagement soon! Maybe consider twentieth december two thousand and twenty four? It's a Friday, so easier for people to attend. Or, if that's too close to Christmas, how about tenth january two thousand and twenty five? Either way, prepone the bookings A-S-A-P, especially if you are thinking of a popular venue. And let's decide on the time too - seven thirty P-M would be good for the function to start, right? Just throwing out some ideas!
